text: #Vaccine #Covid19 The CDC website has a trove of vaccine data, revealing progress — and inequity: The stats on the CDC's vaccine data website are cause for both hope, and — for Black and brown… https://t.co/TJqi5zWwAG | https://t.co/9AaTTqXITl  | https://t.co/mfR4u1I3JG https://t.co/kZWyCa1c0w
